The {{translation|'''Tailed Beast Lariat'''|尾獣の雷犂熱刀|Bijū no Rariatto|furigana=びじゅうのラリアット}} is a [[taijutsu]] [[technique]], available to the [[Eight-Tails]] [[jinchūriki]]. After manifesting their [[Jinchūriki Forms#Version 2|Version 2]] form, without bones, or while in their [[Tailed Beast Mode]], the user charges at the opponent, striking them with a [[Wikipedia:Professional wrestling attacks#Lariat|Lariat]]. It is unknown if this technique contains [[Lightning Release]] [[nature transformation]], like [[Lightning Release: Lariat|the original version]].
